communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All food establishment inspection reports for Burger King located at 5145 Mae Anne Ave, Reno, NV 89523 dated from January 2021-October 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Evan Lake

title: Private email that may have transmitted official business of local government of Cortez

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Rachel Marchbanks is the Community and Economic Development Director. Please list external and internal documents, emails, minutes that originate, reply to, cc, or otherwise include her private email: publisher@tribalcollegejournal.org or rachaelmarchbanks@yahoo.com which have been received or retransmitted by City of Cortez email. This should include but not be limited to staff, advisory, citizens, or other.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Charles Jeter

title: Cortez Zoning Administrator Position Held By What Person - Sec 6.24 of city code

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Ref to 6.24 "Administrative officials.
(a) Zoning Administrator. There is created an official administrative position known as the zoning administrator. The zoning administrator shall be the city planner and shall be appointed by, directed by, and serve at the pleasure of the city manager, except in such cases as noted in Section 2.02 of this code..." 

Please generate a document citing who held the position and between what times / dates  for the 6.24 Zoning Administrator from the present going back to 2014, Jan 1. Include full identifiable information and whatever email and business contact information that they had.

If there are any gaps in this timeline, please provide guidance about how this job would have been performed by another staffer, and who / when that was authorized.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Charles Jeter

title: Information concerning Teri Parks email between public officials

communications.subject: Colorado Open Records Act Request: Information concerning Teri Parks email between public officials
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All messages including text, documents, notes, or emails which have been forwarded, originated from or were addressed or cc'd to: sundog2014@yahoo.com from the present going back to Jan. 1, 2018. If this takes less than an hour,  please do not charge me.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Charles Jeter

title: Cortez City Council and Staff who discussed or attended Zu Gallery

communications.subject: Colorado Open Records Act Request: Cortez City Council and Staff who discussed or attended Zu Gallery
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All external and internal documents, emails, minutes that reply to carpenter81321@protonmail.com or contain the text 'Zu Gallery' from any staff, council, or otherwise are subject to the Colorado Open Records Act. If this takes less than one hour, please fulfill with no charge.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Charles Jeter

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Documentation regarding the agency's partnership with the company, Cloudpermit, including:
-The executed contract with the vendor
-All quotes, proposals, and marketing materials sent to the agency by the vendor
-The Scope of Work, Scope of Services, and/or any documentation detailing what implementation and technical services are being rendered by the vendor

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Lars Hansen
